post:
Hello guys,

We have been waiting to publish some of our offers because we had trouble with our new control panel "SolusIO" and we did not want an overflow of support tickets all over the place.

We have planned a complete website redesign that will be coming in the next couple months because we want it to be amazing and integrated with our control panel, so wait for that :)

On the other hand, we have also planned to start offering dedicated servers in the next couple months as well as a massive offering. We will let you know on that, you would have complete IPMI access.

Now, the real stuff and our offerings! All offerings are KVM Based. They run on Solusvm and SolusIO

So the promo code: 420 applies a 42% discount on:
This promotional code is limited to 42 uses. Afterwards we will update the thread with a new promo code.

##  Our Web Hosting  (Phoenix)
**Does not apply to Basic NVMe**
Link: https://hosterlabs.net/panel/store/premium-shared-hosting
**Featured Plan**
*Free Domains not available
> Plus NVMe
> Disk Storage 25GB
> Bandwidth 1TB/month
> RAM 2GB
> CPU 125%
> NPROC 35
> Else is not limited.
> Final Pricing 1.7$/Month
>  Order [here](https://hosterlabs.net/panel/cart.php?a=add&pid=141 "here")

## Our VPS Premium Offerings  (Quebec, Beauharnois)
Link: https://hosterlabs.net/panel/store/linux-virtual-server-kvm
**Featured Plan**


> Pro KVM Linux
> RAM: 4 GB of RAM
> Space: 45 GB NVMe
> Speed: 1Gbps Unmetered (2Gbps Bursts and 5-10 Gbps local exchanges) 
> CPU: 4 vCPU @ 3.7Ghz
> IPv4 : 1
> IPv6 : 4 /80 Subnets + 1 IPv6
> Final Pricing: 6.96
>  Order [here](https://hosterlabs.net/panel/cart.php?a=add&pid=115 "here")

## Our Budget Offerings  (Quebec, Montreal)
Link: https://hosterlabs.net/panel/store/budget-canadian-vps-kvm
**Featured plan**

> 4.5 GB RAM
> 2000 GB Bandwidth
> 100 GB NVMe Storage
> 3vCPU @2.4Ghz
> IPv4 1
> IPv6 /80 Subnets
> Final Pricing: 4.06$
>  Order [here](https://hosterlabs.net/panel/cart.php?a=add&pid=157 "here")

## IPv6 Offerings too! (Quebec, Beauharnois)
Link: https://hosterlabs.net/panel/store/ipv6-only-canada
**Featured Plan**

**NOTE THIS IS IPV6 ONLY, CHECK YOU HAVE IPV6 CONNECTIVITY BEFORE BUYING**

> vCPU 4 CPU
> Ram 10 GB
> Disk 40GB SSD RAID 1
> /80 IPv6 Block
> KVM Virtualization
>  Order [here](https://hosterlabs.net/panel/cart.php?a=add&pid=147 "here")

## Lastly our German Locations
Link: https://hosterlabs.net/panel/store/german-vps


> vCPU 3 Ryzen Hexacore
> Ram 6 GB
> Disk 30GB NVMe
> 1 IPv4 and /80 IPv6 Block
> KVM Virtualization
> Unmetered 1Gbps
>  Order [here](https://hosterlabs.net/panel/cart.php?a=add&pid=136 "here")

**## Specials for those Crypto Holders**
Pay crypto and get 69% Off on any of the mentioned services with the code: Tothemoon
Note: This only applies for the first 3 billing cycles, no free SSL's or Domains or complements.

And for everyone else, do not worry, there are some "Easter eggs" coupons related to 420 that give you 69% off. Be creative and feel free to post any thoughts/ideas on what you have tried, we might enable them. As of now there are only: 4 cupon code Easter eggs. They are pretty basic and we might have used one of them in the past.

On 4/20/2021 we will enable a special website for random promos, they will not be better than the ones we have right now.
